creator: matt@mattwildig.co.uk
text:
Created attachment 27158
Patch updating link in docs for defaultexcludes task

The docs for the defaultexcludes task has a link to the svn release notes on tigris.org. That site no longer contains those notes, just a link to their new home at subversion.apache.org. I've updated the link to point at the new location.

patch applied in svn revision 1147175

Thanks!
creator: bodewig@apache.org
